com.team30.game.game_mechanics

Class SystemContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team30.game.game_mechanics.SystemContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityContainer

    public class SystemContainer
extends Object
implements EntityContainer
    Handles all systems, and rendering of them

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Set<Integer> activeSystems
      The ID's of all systems that are not destroyed
      private Set<Integer> attackableSystems
      The ID'S of all systems that can be attacked (Cooldown has expired)
      private ArrayList<Action> recordedActions
      Stores all actions taken, in the current snapshot
      private HashMap<Integer,StationSystem> systems
      All systems in the ship

      SystemContainer(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapLayer map)
